While credited as a Tom and Jerry cartoon, this is not the cat-and-mouse team but an earlier Mutt-and-Jeff rip-off featuring them going about to survive in today's turbulent economy. In the end, they channel their problems over into other people's families and homes during busy party moments. Their schemes can be quite devastating but meet with satisfaction from their recent unemployment status.
This short spoofs cut development films with a "Mickey Mouse" theme of unemployment woes

Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you back again to watch it.
I was repelled by this version of Esmeralda by Russell Crowe when I first saw it. Later though, I recognized that she is still very interesting and attractive with her thick lips.
An Academy Award. But what does that mean

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since fled Planet Earth, for with enough money one could emigrate to Orbitals above where there seems to be plenty of dishnow meat for sale. Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to catch the wave of martial arts popularity ; It borrows many cliches from that type and style of films, while substituting thick and heavy jungle foliage for Kathmandu or Kabul. Regardless, the end result is actually quite fun to watch ; Hate-him
